name: Conditioner
description: Miracles intense conditioner is a mild basic conditioner to help restore hair that has been extremely dry.Wash hair and  use conditioner to restore and add moisture to the scalp helps to detangle hair adds shine to dry brittle hair.

name: Shampoo
description: Miracles intense shampoo is a basic mild shampoo it can be used to help with different types of skin and scalp disorders it is made with natural ingredients such as tea tree,eucalyptus,rosemary,avocado oil and more these ingredients are great for dandruff and help to fight off skin bacteria.

name: Astringent
description: Apply hot towel after a shave, then apply astringent for a cool fresh soothing feel, astringent can also be used as a skin cleanser.Miracles intense astringent is made with clove,aloe,eucalyptus,glycerin,water,and alcohol.

name: Oil Shimmer
description: Apply to the scalp as needed for dry, flakey scalp. Can be used to strengthen hair, and add shine to hair. Also used to nourish dry skin.Oil shimmer is made with sweet almond,coconut oil,jojoba oil,castor oil, tea tree,eucalyptus,lavender,rosemary,and olive oil.

name: Twist & Lock/Hair Pomade
description: Apply to the hair or skin for excessive dryness. Use as a twist & lock, lip balm or hair pomade apply to the scalp for dandruff or use to strengthen hair and help promote hair growth.Can be used on the skin during the healing stages of tattoos for dry flaky skin made with bees wax,sweet almond oil,jojoba oil,patchouli oil, bergamot,eucalyptus,and tea tree.
